LanguageData.AF_SpecialBench_CDWFerian.description:
On the edge of the world, it's full of threats. 

Ferians have built this crude machine to safely harness the power of Sydaily crystal. 

But to start the reaction, an unprecedented amount of energy must be injected at once. Even with a sophisticated distribution, building it would still deprive ferians of their most powerful weapons.
LanguageData.AF_SpecialBench_CDWFerian_Frame.label: - (building)
LanguageData.AF_SpecialBench_CDWFerian_Frame.descript:
On the edge of the world, it's full of threats. 

Ferians have built this crude machine to safely harness the power of Sydaily crystal. 

But to start the reaction, an unprecedented amount of energy must be injected at once. Even with a sophisticated distribution, building it would still deprive ferians of their most powerful weapons.
